summary: NAR 04/28/2003   MR    THE CONSUMER RECIEVED SAFETY  RECALL #(02S44) REGARDING AIR BAG MONITORS.  PRIOR TO THAT  THE CONSUMER EXPERIENCED PROBLEMS WITH THE AIR BAG LIGHT FLASHING ON, THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO HAVE REPAIRS MADE  AND IT COST OVER $500.00 FOR A PROBLEM THAT MAY HAVE ALREADY EXISTED IN REFERENCE TO THE RECALL. *CB
